typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Contact as string,
		DepartmentID as integer,
		TA as decimal(18,2),
		DA as decimal(18,2),
		HRA as decimal(18,2),
		Others as decimal(18,2),
		Status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		DepartmentName as string,
		DepartmentLocation as string,
		DepartmentHead as string,
		Status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(DepartmentID == source2@ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(GrossSalary = TA+DA+HRA+Others) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		ID = source1@ID,
		Name,
		DepartmentName,
		DepartmentHead,
		Contact,
		GrossSalary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
